title: Plants and people
creator_contributor_role: Victorian College of Agriculture and Horticulture, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Plant breeding
description: Episode number 1 of Series "Growing awareness: Factors in plant production". This program examines issues related to commercial farming considering the industry aspects of employment, economic value, the relationship between human dependence on plants and plant production, and the impact of technology. Examines the selective breeding used in the domestication of wheat and the use of genetic biology to provide a wider variety of product.
